# include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,n,i=0,points;
	cin>>t;
	while (t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		int a[n],b[n];
		for (i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>a[i];
		}
		for (i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>b[i];
		}
		points=0;
		for (i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			if (a[i]*3+b[i]>points)
			{
				points=a[i]*3+b[i];
			}
		}
		cout<<points<<endl;
	}
}
